titles.title: Bikini Resettlement and Relocation Act
Bikini Resettlement and Relocation Act
A bill to provide for the resettlement and relocation of the people of Bikini.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 115-501.

bill.summary:
Bikini Resettlement and Relocation Act
This bill amends the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1982, to: (1) allocate funds for the relocation and resettlement of the Bikini people living on Kili and Ejit Islands, subject to the right of disapproval of the Department of the Interior; and (2) limit annual expenditures from the Resettlement Fund to 5% of the principal amount of the fund.
